snippet: The designer’s clothing looks right at home amid one of Rome’s most celebrated collections.
abstract: Couture/Sculpture exhibition at Villa Borghese in Rome features 65 garments made by Azzedine Alaia strategically placed throughout the building.
lead_paragraph: The designer’s clothing looks right at home amid one of Rome’s most celebrated collections.

headline.print_headline: Enough to Turn a Goddess’s Head
headline.main: Azzedine Alaïa: Blending Fashion and Art in ‘Couture/Sculpture’
